Description: Circular steatite stamp seal with low convex domed back; the back is perforated; the face design is symmetrical and shows a central cross quartering the object with each quarter containing a pair of v-shapes aligned with the central cross.
Curator's comments: Greville John Chester acquired objects from throughout the Middle East and Egypt with little to no documentation on specific object's origins existing.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
